text: Pentaspadon is a genus of plants in the family Anacardiaceae. ==Taxonomy== ===Species=== , Plants of the World online has 6 accepted species: * Pentaspadon annamense * Pentaspadon curtisii * Pentaspadon minutiflora * Pentaspadon motleyi * Pentaspadon poilanei * Pentaspadon velutinus ==References== Category:Anacardiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pentaspadon
